title: Where Will Ronnie Go?
description:
The FC Crew discuss Cristiano Ronaldo's return back to Manchester United and what team best fits the Portuguese star. Also, Joan Laporta says Barcelona is back to being sound economically. Plus, the guys react to Matthijs De Ligit telling his new manager Julian Nagelsmann that the Bayern Munich training session was the hardest he's had in the last four years .
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
